data.instruction: As biz member, list bookings and progress one booking through operational status updates.
data.expectedResult: Authorized role can update status while preserving auditability and lifecycle consistency.

data.instruction: As biz member, list bookings and progress one booking through operational status updates.
data.expectedResult: Authorized role can update status while preserving auditability and lifecycle consistency.

data.instruction: Read reporting endpoints and verify booking totals, counts, and statuses align with saga actions.
data.expectedResult: Reported metrics match booking actions and highlight any discrepancies for schema/API iteration.

data.instruction: Attempt unauthorized cross-biz visibility/mutation in marketplace/enterprise scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Unauthorized access is denied and no sensitive tenant data leaks across business boundaries.

requestBody.title: Owner reviews consolidated calendar state API Trace

error.message: You are not a member of this biz.

data.title: Owner reviews consolidated calendar state API Trace

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.
